it.polimi.ingsw.ps21.model.properties

Class Property

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps21.model.properties.Property
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Property
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Used to store datas of resources and points. The following datas are stored for each property:
  • the id, which is a value of the PropertieId enum that identifies the property;
  • the value, which is an integer value that describes the quantity of that property;
  • the paymentModifier, which is an integer value that is added to the quantity to pay each time the payValue(num) method is called.
  • the additionModifier, which is an integer value that is added to the quantity to add each time the addValue(num) method is called.
Author:
fabri

      • addValue

        public boolean addValue(int num)
        Increases the value stored in the object by (num + additionModifier) units. This method can't be used to reduce the value of the property.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded, false if the 'num' parameter is negative

      • payValue

        public boolean payValue(int num)
        Reduces the value stored in the object by (num + paymentModifier) units This method can't be used to increase the value of the property.

        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded, false if the 'num' parameter is negative

      • setPaymentModifier

        public void setPaymentModifier(int modifier)
        Sets the modifier that modifies the number that is subtracted from the property's value when the payValue(num) method is called. When the payValue(num) method is called, (num + modifier) is subtracted from the property's value.
        Parameters:
        modifier - the value of the modifier to set

        Parameters:
        increasingModifier - the increasingModifier to set
